member.name: P:Enterprise.AutoMapper.Assemblies.AutoMapperAssemblyService.AssembliesToRegister
member.summary: This is a collection of assemblies that contain mapping profiles. If there are no assemblies added to this collection, a fallback will be used that loads solution assemblies.

member.name: M:Enterprise.AutoMapper.Assemblies.AutoMapperAssemblyService.AddAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Explicitly add an assembly containing one or more mapping profiles. This will be included when AutoMapper services are registered.

member.name: M:Enterprise.AutoMapper.Assemblies.AutoMapperAssemblyService.RemoveAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Explicitly remove an assembly containing one or more mapping profiles. This will NOT be included when AutoMapper services are registered.

member.name: P:Enterprise.AutoMapper.Options.AutoMapperOptions.EnableAutoMapper
member.summary: Determines if AutoMapper services will be registered. Defaults to true.

member.name: M:Enterprise.AutoMapper.Options.AutoMapperOptions.AddAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Explicitly add an assembly containing AutoMapper profiles. This will be included when AutoMapper services are registered.
